channel.title: Npcs face you in combat
channel.description:
well i was wondering how i would go about making npcs face me when im in combat ?
the currently just face one way but i want them to turn and face me
so can any 1 please tell me how i make them face me ?
thanks alot :)
WILL REP IF IT WORKS !!!!!
